Package net.axiomx.client

Class AClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.axiomx.client.AClient
  • public class AClient
extends java.lang.Object

    Here is a means of accessing AxiomX data. Any request will wait for callbacks before returning any information. If you wish to send concurrent requests, re-implement this class.

    Version:
    1.9.4
    Author:
    Bailey Danseglio

      Connects to the AxiomX data farm.

               java.io.IOException,
               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Connects to the AxiomX data farm.
        Parameters:
        user - (This has no effect but should not be left empty)
        pass - The beta product key

        java.net.UnknownHostException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • getHistOptData

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getHistOptData​(java.lang.String sym,
                                                            java.lang.String exp,
                                                            java.lang.String right,
                                                            double strike,
                                                            java.lang.String type)
        Returns all Bars available on one minute intervals.
        Parameters:
        sym - Underlying symbol
        exp - Expiration date
        right - "Put" for put, "Call" for call
        strike - Strike price
        type - "Trades" for volumes, "midpoint" for mark prices.
        Returns:
        Bars on 1 minute intervals for the given period
